com.opensymphony.sitemesh.compatability
Compatability classes to enable easy migration of SiteMesh 1 and 2 applications to SiteMesh 3.
com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.decorator
The Decorator Package.
  • Classes in com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.decorator used by com.opensymphony.sitemesh.compatability
    Class
    Description
    BaseWebAppDecorator
    Convenient base class for all Java web-app based decorators that make use of the Servlet API.
  • Classes in com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.decorator used by com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.decorator
    Class
    Description
    BaseWebAppDecorator
    Convenient base class for all Java web-app based decorators that make use of the Servlet API.
    DispatchedDecorator
    Decorator that dispatches to another path in the Servlet Container (such as a JSP or path mapped to a Servlet).
